title: Introducing: Hollow Giants
content:
Australia, you’re breaking my heart.

Everything coming from down under at the moment is right on point, and this new project, Brisbane’s Hollow Giants, is no exception. Two tracks, Whisper and a self-titled number, both are unfurling beauties, characterised by their imperfect yet devastatingly honest vocals and minimal instrumentation. Of the two, the self-titled is the more complete number, bewitching in atmosphere and lyrical content – ‘don’t you run down / to the oceans in your mind / don’t you ever scream / for release’. There’s hints of Thom Yorke in the despondent vocals and touches of Alt-J amongst the hazy guitar lines, both combining to utterly unique effect.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
